channel.title: Lol wut? Anyone know how to fix? This is SimpleMachines [lock please]
channel.description:
Well ive been running some forums called RunePal for about 3 to 4 days and yesterday i got this error for trying to add a co.cc domain
[size=16pt]Connection Problems[/size] Sorry, SMF was unable to connect to the database. This may be caused by the server being busy. Please try again later.
Ive tried deleting and remaking a server database and it still doesnt work btw im using ulmb as a free webhost. The password user and database name are all correct and the settings.php and settings_bak.php are all set but i get that one error everytime. Looking forward to seeing all your guys comments tomorrow morning, thanks bye!

item.title: Lol wut? Anyone know how to fix? This is SimpleMachines [lock please]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I actually have premium[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 03, 2009, 09:38:03 pm[/size][hr]Okay ive just reset everything. Lock please

Read full topic

item.title: Lol wut? Anyone know how to fix? This is SimpleMachines [lock please]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

The Reaper X:

It’s probably because the database you used before is under a different domain. by changing it you lost the database and changed it to another. It’s happened to me before with phpBB.

Everything is right from the settings down to the database. Ive tripple if not doubled cheaked everything

Read full topic
